memory:
To achieve the mission of picking up the purple box, I should have planned a more efficient route to the box's location. Upon obtaining the green key and unlocking the green door, I should have turned left and moved down towards the purple box instead of moving east again. This would have allowed me to reach the box's location sooner and pick it up before running out of time. I should have also prioritized the subgoal of moving down to the purple box after unlocking the green door.

New subgoal list: ['move down after unlocking door','move to purple box location directly', 'go to purple box', 'achieve the "mission" as soon as possible']
